alert.note: Alert for Banks; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Banks, east central Hall and northwestern Jackson Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Gillsville, or 7 miles east of Gainesville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Maysville and Gillsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
